title: dist: Go1.1 Mac installer installs sub-repos to /src/ and /pkg/
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Install Go1.1 via package installer for Mac.

What is the expected output?

No files in /
Sub-repos should be go get'd if needed.

What do you see instead?

Two folders in /
/src/
/pkg/

They contain sub-repos.

Which operating system are you using?

Mac OS X 10.8.3

Please provide any additional information below.

I don't believe this happened in the Go1.0 installer - at least if these files were
installed, they were not in the root.

BOM receipt file attached.
Attachments: 1. com.googlecode.go.bom (1373989 bytes)
